text: Steve "Mr. Escape" Baker (July 26, 1938 â€“ September 17, 2017) was an American comedian and magician. He was best known as an escape artist. He was born in Oakland, California. == Career == During his career from 1967 through the early 1990s Baker appeared on Dick Clark's LIVE Wednesday, Games People Play, and was a star on an HBO special along with Tony Curtis and special guest star Dorothy Dietrich, called The World's Greatest Escapes, and several times on That's Incredible!. Baker died on September 17, 2017 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American magicians Category:Comedians from Oakland, California
title: Steve Baker (illusionist)
